_header: To playen and ragen is for thy prow
_description: ‘Consilium Diaboli’ — three couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
To pleyȝen & ragen is for þi pruWanne suldest þu
                    pleyȝen betre þan nou……An doute þe nouth to
                    sennen mikilffor godes merci was neuere fikil
NLS18721.Attributed Title:
De Accidia (f. 16); Iste est Consilium Diaboli (f. 16, right
                    margin)
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 4.
